name: Asphyxiation
description:
Asphyxiation is a short story based game in which you play as a role of a depressed man from the moment he wakes up one early morning.This is more of an interactive story than an actual video game, where you can know how it is feel to be depressed.

The story is pretty disturbing and weird, but it’s not shoved down your throat. What is in this game does not represent actual things, The photos on the wall has a symbolic meaning.

P.S- The following game contains suicide or self-harm topics, so Viewer discretion advised. Also if you feel depressed, go talk to someone.
